docs.lead_paragraph: Cribs, bicycle helmets and child safety seats are just a few of the products that consumer should be wary about buying used, advocacy groups say.

headline.seo: Be Wary of Deals on Used Cribs, Helmets and Car Safety Seats
headline.main: Bargains on Used Goods May Prove Costly
headline.print_headline: Bargains on Used Goods May Prove Costly

docs.snippet: Cribs, bicycle helmets and child safety seats are just a few of the products that consumer should be wary about buying used, advocacy groups say.

docs.lead_paragraph: The discussion earlier this week about the many ways to make a baby led Ruth Ragan to send me the memoir she wrote for an online writing class at the University of California,  Berkeley. Ms. Ragan was an anonymous egg donor 15 years ago, and reading Jennifer Weiner’s questions here about how donors might feel years later, she wanted to give her answer.
docs.abstract: Worrying about children who might have been born from a donation 15 years ago.
docs.snippet: Worrying about children who might have been born from a donation 15 years ago.
